members.name: getBody
members.comment: Returns an OutputStream to which the response body can be written.

throws: IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the response body
return: an OutputStream to which the response body can be written

members.name: abort
members.comment: Aborts the attempt to cache the response. If an IOException is encountered while reading the response or writing to the cache, the current cache store operation will be abandoned.

name: java.net.CacheRequest
comment: Represents channels for storing resources in the ResponseCache. Instances of such a class provide an OutputStream object which is called by protocol handlers to store the resource data into the cache, and also an abort() method which allows a cache store operation to be interrupted and abandoned. If an IOException is encountered while reading the response or writing to the cache, the current cache store operation will be aborted.
